Recipe.title: Prawn Cocktail Platter

Recipe.ingredients: Combine oil and garlic in a small bowl. Brush both sides of baguette with oil mixture. Arrange on a large baking tray in a single layer. Cook for about 10 minutes, or until golden and crisp.
Recipe.instructions: Â¼ cup olive oil 2 cloves garlic, crushed 1 small sourdough baguette, thinly sliced 16 medium fresh, cooked king prawns, tail intact 2 little gem lettuce, leaves washed and separated 1 firm, ripe avocado, sliced Dill sprigs, to serve
